trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows control to display a list of items.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于显示项列表的 Windows 控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control enables you to display a list of items to the user that the user can select by clicking.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控制，你可以向用户可以通过单击选择的用户显示的项的列表。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control can provide single or multiple selections using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件可以提供一个或多个选择使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> also provides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MultiColumn%2A> property to enable the display of items in columns instead of a straight vertical list of items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>还提供了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MultiColumn%2A>属性以支持的项的项而不是直接垂直列表的列中显示。

trans-unit.source: With this, the control can display more visible items and the user no longer needs to scroll to an item.
trans-unit.target: 与此操作，该控件可以显示更多可见项和用户不再需要滚动到某项。

trans-unit.source: Typically, Windows handles the task of drawing the items to display in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 通常，Windows 会处理绘制要在中显示的项的任务<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> events so you can override the automatic drawing that Windows provides and draw the items yourself.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性，并处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件以便您可以重写绘制 Windows 自动提供和自己绘制项。

trans-unit.source: You can use owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> controls to display variable-height items, images, or a different color or font for the text of each item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用所有者描述<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件以显示在列表中的高度可变的项、 图像或不同的颜色或每个项的文本的字体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemRectangle%2A> also help you draw your own items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>属性， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemRectangle%2A>还有助于在绘制自己的项目。

trans-unit.source: In addition to display and selection functionality, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> also provides features that enable you to efficiently add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and to find text within the items of the list.
trans-unit.target: 显示和选择功能，除了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>还提供功能，您可以有效地将项添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>并查找的项列表中的文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods enable you to add a large number of items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> without the control being repainted each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法使你能够添加大量的项到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>而无需每次都重新绘制控件项添加到列表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> methods enable you to search for an item in the list that contains a specific search string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法使你能够搜索包含特定的搜索字符串的列表中的项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> properties provide access to the three collections that are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>属性提供对由三个集合的访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The following table outlines the three collections used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and their use within the control.
trans-unit.target: 下表概述了使用的三个集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件内及其用法。

trans-unit.source: Collection class
trans-unit.target: 集合类

trans-unit.target: 使用中 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Contains all items contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含中包含的所有项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of the selected items which is a subset of the items contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含选定项的集合，这是包含的项的子集在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of the selected indexes, which is a subset of the indexes of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 包含一套所选的索引，这是索引的子集的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>。

trans-unit.source: These indexes specify items that are selected.
trans-unit.target: 这些索引指定选定项。

trans-unit.source: The following three examples show the three indexed collections that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class supports.
trans-unit.target: 以下三个示例显示三个索引的集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>类支持。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class enables you to add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>类使你能够将项添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method can accept any object when adding a member to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法可以接受任何对象时向其中添加成员<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: When an object is being added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, the control uses the text defined in the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method of the object unless a member name within the object is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当一个对象将被添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，该控件使用中定义的文本<xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>对象方法除非内对象的成员名中指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In addition to adding items using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class you can also add items using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 除了使用添加项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>类还可以添加项使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DataSource%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl>类。

trans-unit.source: If you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> on a base Windows form and want to modify the string collections of those controls in a derived Windows form, the string collections of those controls in the base Windows form must be empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果你有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>必须在基的 Windows 窗体和想要修改这些控件派生的 Windows 窗体中的字符串集合，这些基本的 Windows 窗体中的控件的字符串集合为空。

trans-unit.source: If the string collections are not empty, they become read-only when you derive another Windows form.
trans-unit.target: 如果不为空字符串集合，这些变为只读派生另一个 Windows 窗体时。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control that displays multiple items in columns and can have more than one item selected in the control's list.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>列中显示多个项，并且可以有多个项在控件的列表中选择的控件。

trans-unit.source: The code for the example adds 50 items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class and then selects three items from the list using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的代码添加到 50 个项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>类，然后选择三个项从列表使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code then displays values from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection> collection, through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>, through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该代码显示中的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>集合，通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>属性，与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>，直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the code is located in and called from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要的代码是位于并从调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control that displays multiple items in columns and can have more than one item selected in the control's list.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>列中显示多个项，并且可以有多个项在控件的列表中选择的控件。

trans-unit.source: The code for the example adds 50 items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class and then selects three items from the list using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例的代码添加到 50 个项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>类，然后选择三个项从列表使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code then displays values from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection> collection, through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>, through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该代码显示中的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedObjectCollection>集合，通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedItems%2A>属性，与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection>，直到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndices%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the code is located in and called from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要的代码是位于并从调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: An array of objects.
trans-unit.target: 对象数组。

trans-unit.source: This member is obsolete, and there is no replacement.
trans-unit.target: 此成员已过时，且无替代项。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> currently enables selection of list items.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 当前是否启用了列表项的选择。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode.None" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionMode.None" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件背景色的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultBackColor" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: The background image of the form.
trans-unit.target: 窗体的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BackgroundImage" /> property of the label changes.
trans-unit.target: 在标签的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BackgroundImage" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image layout for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> as defined in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 按照 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 枚举中的定义获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 的背景图像布局。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 的值之一。

trans-unit.source: The values are <see langword="Center" />, <see langword="None" />, <see langword="Stretch" />, <see langword="Tile" />, or <see langword="Zoom" />.
trans-unit.target: 值为 <see langword="Center" />、<see langword="None" />、<see langword="Stretch" />、<see langword="Tile" /> 或 <see langword="Zoom" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Center" /> is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="Center" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: The specified enumeration value does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定的枚举值不存在。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BackgroundImageLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BackgroundImageLayout" /> 属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: Maintains performance while items are added to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> one at a time by preventing the control from drawing until the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 当向 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中一次添加一个项时，通过防止该控件绘图来维护性能，直到调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate" /> 方法为止。

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add multiple items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>).
trans-unit.target: 添加到多个项的首选的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>类 (通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>)。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list in a single operation.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以向单个操作中的列表添加项的数组。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要添加项时使用一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>类，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以防止重新绘制控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>每次向列表添加项。

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 完成向列表添加项的任务后，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法，以使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>重绘窗体。

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法添加项可以防止闪烁的绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>大量的项添加到列表时。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods while adding five thousand items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法添加到五千项时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and that this method is placed within the form and called from it.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件，名为`listBox1`，已添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与，放置在窗体中并从其调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of border that is drawn around the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 四周绘制的边框的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle.Fixed3D" />。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 该值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Unselects all items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 取消选择 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中的所有项。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is equivalent to setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property to negative one (-1).
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法等效于设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>属性为负一 (-1)。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to quickly unselect all items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于快速取消选择列表中的所有项。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.TopIndex%2A> property to move the currently selected item to the top of the list of items in the display area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectedIndex%2A>具有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.TopIndex%2A>属性以将当前所选的项移动到中的显示区域的项列表的顶部<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example further demonstrates how to remove items using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> class, and how to clear all item selection using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ClearSelected%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示了如何删除使用项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>类，以及如何清除所有项选择使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ClearSelected%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The code first moves the currently selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to the top of the list.
trans-unit.target: 代码首先移动当前选定的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>到列表的顶部。

trans-unit.source: The code then removes all items before the currently selected item and clears all selections in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 然后，代码中移除当前选定项之前的所有项并清除中的所有选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> containing items is added to a form and that an item is currently selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>包含项添加到窗体和项是当前在中选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 在单击 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of columns in a multicolumn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置多列 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of each column in the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件中每列的宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: If you set the value to zero (0), a default width is assigned to each column.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将值设置为零 (0) 时，默认宽度将分配给每个列。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, this property returns the current width of each column in the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是多列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，此属性返回列表中的每个列的当前宽度。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to ensure that each column in a multicolumn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> can properly display its items.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性以确保，在多列中的每个列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>可以对各个项进行正确显示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a simple two-column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示一个简单的两个列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: A value less than zero is assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 给此属性分配一个小于零的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the item collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建项集合的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> that represents the new item collection.
trans-unit.target: 表示新项集合的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: You can override this in your derived classes to provide a different collection to store your items.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在你提供用于存储你的项的不同集合的派生类中替代此。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 获取创建控件句柄时所需要的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，包含创建控件的句柄时所需的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用于操作与非托管代码。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the tabs between the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中的项之间的制表符的宽度。

trans-unit.source: A collection of integers representing the tab widths.
trans-unit.target: 表示制表符宽度的整数的集合。

trans-unit.source: The integer array contains the tab spaces in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 整数数组包含升序排序的选项卡空格。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default item height for an owner-drawn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 为所有者描述的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 指定默认项高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> changes.
trans-unit.target: 在所有者绘制的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 的可视方位更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is used by an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此事件由一个所有者绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The event is only raised when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed` or `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`.
trans-unit.target: 事件才会引发时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性设置为`DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed`或`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`。

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks needed to draw items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此事件来执行绘制项所需的任务<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you have a variable-sized item (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`), before drawing an item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果你拥有一个可变大小的项 (时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性设置为`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`)，在绘制某一项前,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem> event to specify the size for the item that you are going to draw in your event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.MeasureItem>事件，以指定要绘制事件处理程序中的项的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建所有者描述<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>项。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 该代码使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性指定绘制的项固定大小和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件以执行到每个项的绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: 该示例代码使用的属性和方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>类作为参数传递给事件处理程序来绘制项。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control called `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件称为`listBox1`已添加到窗体，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序处理事件。

trans-unit.source: The example also requires that items have been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还要求项已添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>包括"Apple"、"橙色"和"Plum"按此顺序的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the drawing mode for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的绘图模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode" /> values representing the mode for drawing the items of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode" /> 值之一，表示用于绘制控件的项的模式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="DrawMode.Normal" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="DrawMode.Normal" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> items.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建所有者描述<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>项。

trans-unit.source: The code uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property to specify that the items drawn are fixed sized and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event to perform the drawing of each item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 该代码使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性指定绘制的项固定大小和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>事件以执行到每个项的绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example code uses the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs> class passed as a parameter to the event handler to draw the items.
trans-unit.target: 该示例代码使用的属性和方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs>类作为参数传递给事件处理程序来绘制项。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control called `listBox1` has been added to a form and that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem> event is handled by the event handler defined in the example code.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件称为`listBox1`已添加到窗体，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawItem>由示例代码中定义的事件处理程序处理事件。

trans-unit.source: The example also requires that items have been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with the text of "Apple", "Orange", and "Plum" in that order.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还要求项已添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>包括"Apple"、"橙色"和"Plum"按此顺序的文本。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 分配给属性的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawMode" /> 枚举的成员。

trans-unit.source: A multicolumn <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> cannot have a variable-sized height.
trans-unit.target: 多列 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 的高度不能变化。

trans-unit.source: Resumes painting the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> control after painting is suspended by the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate" /> 方法挂起绘制后，该方法恢复绘制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: The preferred way to add items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class (through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>).
trans-unit.target: 将项添加到的首选的方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.AddRange%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>类 (通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>)。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to add an array of items to the list at one time.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以一次向列表添加项的数组。

trans-unit.source: However, if you want to add items one at a time using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection> class, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> method to prevent the control from repainting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> each time an item is added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你想要添加项时使用一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Add%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection>类，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>方法，以防止重新绘制控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>每次向列表添加项。

trans-unit.source: Once you have completed the task of adding items to the list, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> method to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to repaint.
trans-unit.target: 完成向列表添加项的任务后，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法，以使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>重绘窗体。

trans-unit.source: This way of adding items can prevent flickered drawing of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> when a large number of items are being added to the list.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法添加项可以防止闪烁的绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>大量的项添加到列表时。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A> methods while adding five thousand items to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.BeginUpdate%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.EndUpdate%2A>方法添加到五千项时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and that this method is placed within the form and called from it.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件，名为`listBox1`，已添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>与，放置在窗体中并从其调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> that starts with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 查找 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中以指定字符串开始的第一个项。

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的文本。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> that starts with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 查找 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中以指定字符串开始的第一个项。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" /> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到的第一个项的从零开始的索引；如果找不到匹配项，则返回 <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" />。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search looks for words that partially match the specified search string parameter, `s`.
trans-unit.target: 搜索查找与指定的搜索字符串参数，部分匹配的单词`s`。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于搜索与指定的字符串匹配的第一项。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然后，你可以执行任务，例如删除通过使用包含搜索文本的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或更改项的文本。

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use the version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦你找到指定的文本，如果你想要搜索的文本中的其他实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，你可以使用的版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>指定内的起始索引为提供一个参数的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要执行搜索而不是部分匹配的确切的单词匹配，则使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> method to search for the first instance of a string in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>方法搜索中的字符串的第一个实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If no items are found that match the search string <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> returns a -1 value and the example displays a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
trans-unit.target: 如果未找到项时与搜索字符串相匹配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>返回-1 值，该示例显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>。

trans-unit.source: If an item is found that matches the search text, the example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A> method to select the item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 如果匹配的搜索文本找到的项，该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A>方法来选择中的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="s" /> parameter is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the item count.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="s" /> 参数的值小于 -1，或者大于或等于项的计数。

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的文本。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item before the first item to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 项的从零开始的索引，该项在要搜索的第一个项之前。

trans-unit.source: Set to negative one (-1) to search from the beginning of the control.
trans-unit.target: 设置为负一 (-1) 以从控件的开始处进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> that starts with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 查找 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中以指定字符串开始的第一个项。

trans-unit.source: The search starts at a specific starting index.
trans-unit.target: 搜索从特定的起始索引处开始。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" /> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到的第一个项的从零开始的索引；如果找不到匹配项，则返回 <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" />。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search looks for words that partially match the specified search string parameter, `s`.
trans-unit.target: 搜索查找与指定的搜索字符串参数，部分匹配的单词`s`。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string at the specified starting index within the list of items for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法要搜索匹配项的列表中指定的起始索引处的指定的字符串的第一项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然后，你可以执行任务，例如删除通过使用包含搜索文本的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或更改项的文本。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法的未指定起始索引版本建立调用之后，通常使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中找到的初始项后, 此方法通常用于通过指定中的索引位置查找进一步的搜索文本实例`startIndex`的搜索文本的第一个找到实例之后的项的参数。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a search for an exact word match instead of a partial match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要执行搜索而不是部分匹配的确切的单词匹配，则使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When the search reaches the bottom of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, it continues searching from the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> back to the item specified by the `startIndex` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当搜索到达底部<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，它将继续按自上而下的搜索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>回由指定的项`startIndex`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> method to search for all instances of the search text in the items of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>方法搜索中的项的搜索文本的所有实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> method that enables you to specify a starting search index from which to do a continual search of all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用的版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>方法，可用于指定从其执行中的所有项持续搜索的起始搜索索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates how to determine when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> method begins searching from the top of the list after it reaches the bottom of the list of items to prevent a recursive search.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示如何确定何时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>方法开始后到达要阻止的递归搜索的项列表的底部，从列表的顶部搜索。

trans-unit.source: Once items are found in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, they are selected using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在找到项后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，它们使用选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="startIndex" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 参数或者小于零，或者大于或等于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> 类的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> that exactly matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 查找 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中第一个精确匹配指定字符串的项。

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的文本。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> that exactly matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 查找 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中第一个精确匹配指定字符串的项。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" /> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到的第一个项的从零开始的索引；如果找不到匹配项，则返回 <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" />。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search looks for an exact match to the words specified in the search string parameter, `s`.
trans-unit.target: 搜索查找完全匹配的搜索字符串参数中指定的词语`s`。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于搜索与指定的字符串匹配的第一项。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or changing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然后，你可以执行任务，例如删除通过使用包含搜索文本的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或更改项的文本。

trans-unit.source: Once you have found the specified text, if you want to search for other instances of the text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, you can use the version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> method that provides a parameter for specifying a starting index within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 一旦你找到指定的文本，如果你想要搜索的文本中的其他实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，你可以使用的版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>指定内的起始索引为提供一个参数的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform partial word search instead of an exact word match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要执行而不是确切的单词匹配的部分单词搜索，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to search a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control for an item that exactly matches a specified string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法搜索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>与指定的字符串完全匹配的项的控件。

trans-unit.source: If no items are found that match the search string, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> returns a -1 value and the example displays a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不找到与搜索字符串匹配的任何项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>返回-1 值，该示例显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>。

trans-unit.source: If an item is found that matches the search text, the example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A> method to select the item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 如果匹配的搜索文本找到的项，该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A>方法来选择中的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The text to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的文本。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item before the first item to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 项的从零开始的索引，该项在要搜索的第一个项之前。

trans-unit.source: Set to negative one (-1) to search from the beginning of the control.
trans-unit.target: 设置为负一 (-1) 以从控件的开始处进行搜索。

trans-unit.source: Finds the first item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> that exactly matches the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 查找 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中第一个精确匹配指定字符串的项。

trans-unit.source: The search starts at a specific starting index.
trans-unit.target: 搜索从特定的起始索引处开始。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first item found; returns <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" /> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 找到的第一个项的从零开始的索引；如果找不到匹配项，则返回 <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" />。

trans-unit.source: The search performed by this method is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行的搜索不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The search looks for words that exactly match the specified search string parameter, `s`.
trans-unit.target: 搜索查找与指定的搜索字符串参数，完全匹配的单词`s`。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to search for the first item that matches the specified string at the specified starting index within the list of items for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法要搜索匹配项的列表中指定的起始索引处的指定的字符串的第一项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: You can then perform tasks such as removing the item that contains the search text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A> method or change the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 然后，你可以执行任务，例如删除包含搜索文本使用的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Remove%2A>方法或更改项的文本。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically used after a call has been made using the version of this method that does not specify a starting index.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法的未指定起始索引版本建立调用之后，通常使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Once an initial item has been found in the list, this method is typically used to find further instances of the search text by specifying the index position in the `startIndex` parameter of the item after the first found instance of the search text.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中找到的初始项后, 此方法通常用于通过指定中的索引位置查找进一步的搜索文本实例`startIndex`的搜索文本的第一个找到实例之后的项的参数。

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform a partial word search instead of an exact word match, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要执行而不是确切的单词匹配的部分单词搜索，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When the search reaches the bottom of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, it continues searching from the top of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> back to the item specified by the `startIndex` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当搜索到达底部<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，它将继续按自上而下的搜索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>回由指定的项`startIndex`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> method to search for all items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> that exactly match the specified search text.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法搜索中的所有项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>与指定的都搜索文本完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the version of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> method that enables you to specify a starting search index from which to do a continual search of all items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用的版本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法，可用于指定从其执行中的所有项持续搜索的起始搜索索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates how to determine when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A> method begins searching from the top of the list after it reaches the bottom of the list of items, to prevent a recursive search.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示如何确定何时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.FindStringExact%2A>方法开始后到达的项，以防止的递归搜索列表的底部，从列表的顶部搜索。

trans-unit.source: Once items are found in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, they are selected using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在找到项后<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，它们使用选择<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SetSelected%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="startIndex" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 参数或者小于零，或者大于或等于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> 类的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件显示的文字的字体。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于由控件显示的文本的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的前景色。

trans-unit.source: The foreground <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的前景 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultForeColor" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to return the height for.
trans-unit.target: 要返回其高度的项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the height of an item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中某项的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 指定的项的高度，以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is not set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, the value of the index parameter is ignored because all items in a standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are the same size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性未设置为`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`，索引参数的值被忽略，因为标准中的所有项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>大小相同。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property when you are using an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to determine the size of any item within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性，当你使用一个所有者绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>来确定内的任何项的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value of the <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than the item count.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="index" /> 参数值小于零或大于项的计数。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of item whose bounding rectangle you want to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回其边框的项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle for an item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中的项的边框。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounding rectangle for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示指定项的边框。

trans-unit.source: If the item specified in the `index` parameter is not visible, the rectangle returned by this method will be outside the visible portion of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果中指定的项`index`参数不可见，此方法返回的矩形将位于控件的可见部分之外。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine the size and position of an item within the list.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可用于确定的大小和位置列表中的项。

trans-unit.source: To get the height of an item, especially a variable-height owner drawn list item, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的项的高度，尤其是一个高度可变的所有者描述的列表项，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 参数或者小于零，或者大于或等于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> 类的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the area for which to retrieve the display bounds.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在显示器边界中检索的区域的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The height and width of the control's bounds.
trans-unit.target: 控件边界的高度和宽度。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值之一，指定在定义控件大小和位置时要使用的控件边界。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the bounds within which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> is scaled.
trans-unit.target: 检索 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 在其中进行缩放的边界。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the bounds within which the control is scaled.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示控件缩放边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> class overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetScaledBounds%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to ensure that the requested height is scaled rather than the current height.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>类重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GetScaledBounds%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以确保请求的高度比例进行调整而不是当前的高度。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item that determines whether it is selected.
trans-unit.target: 项的从零开始的索引，根据该索引确定该项是否被选定。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否选定了指定的项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified item is currently selected in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中选定了指定的项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to quickly determine whether a specified item is selected.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此方法来快速确定指定的项是否处于选定状态。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful when a specific operation needs to be performed when a specific item in a multiple-selection <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is selected.
trans-unit.target: 当需要时多选中特定项执行特定操作时，此方法很有用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>选择。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetSelected%2A> method to determine which items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are selected in order to select the items that are not selected and deselect the items that are selected.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetSelected%2A>方法来确定中的哪些项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>才能选择未选定的项，并取消选择选定项选择。

trans-unit.source: The example also demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A> property to enable a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to have more than one selected item and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Sorted%2A> property to demonstrate how to sort items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> automatically.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示了如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.SelectionMode%2A>属性来启用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>若要有多个选择项，并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Sorted%2A>属性来演示如何在中的项进行排序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>自动。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, named `listBox1`, has been added to a form and that the `InitializeMyListBox` method defined in the example is called from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event of the form.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>命名`listBox1`，已添加到窗体，`InitializeMyListBox`示例中定义的方法调用从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load>窗体的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> parameter is less than zero or greater than or equal to the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 参数或者小于零，或者大于或等于 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection.Count" /> 类的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width by which the horizontal scroll bar of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> can scroll.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 的水平滚动条可滚动的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, that the horizontal scroll bar can scroll the control.
trans-unit.target: 水平滚动条可滚动控件的宽度，以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为零。

trans-unit.source: This property only reports a useful value if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只报告有用的值，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is smaller than the value of this property, the horizontal scroll bar horizontally scrolls items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 如果宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>小于此属性，则水平滚动条在水平滚动项的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is equal to or greater than this value, the horizontal scroll bar is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>等于或大于此值，将会隐藏水平滚动条。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is not dynamically updated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值不会通过动态更新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when the items of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性很有用的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是所有者描述。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the owner drawn items of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> are 200 pixels wide, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is 60 pixels wide, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> property would need to be set to 200 in order to scroll the right edge of the items into the visible region of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果所有者描述的项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是 200 像素宽，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>为 60 个像素宽，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>属性需要将设置为 200 以滚动到控件的可见区域的项的右边缘。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> properties to display a horizontal scroll bar that shows all item text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>属性，以显示水平滚动条的显示中的所有项文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A> property to ensure that items are not partially displayed due to the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A>属性以确保项未部分显示的大小由于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a form.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件，名为`listBox1`，已添加到表单。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a horizontal scroll bar is displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在控件中显示水平滚动条。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to display a horizontal scroll bar in the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在控件中显示水平滚动条；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A> property determines whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> should display a horizontal scroll bar when the width of items within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> extend beyond the right edge of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>属性确定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>应显示水平滚动栏时中的项的宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>超出控件的右边缘。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the scroll bar is automatically displayed based on the width of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，则会基于中的项的宽度自动显示滚动条<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> is an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, in order to properly display a horizontal scroll bar, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>是一个所有者绘制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，以便正确地显示水平滚动条，必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> properties to display a horizontal scroll bar that shows all item text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>属性，以显示水平滚动条的显示中的所有项文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A> property to ensure that items are not partially displayed due to the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A>属性以确保项未部分显示的大小由于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a form.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件，名为`listBox1`，已添加到表单。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the item at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定坐标处的项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> object containing the coordinates used to obtain the item index.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> 对象，包含用于获取项索引的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the item at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定坐标处的项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item found at the specified coordinates; returns <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" /> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 在指定坐标处找到的项的从零开始的索引；如果找不到匹配项，则返回 <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" />。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine which item is located at a specific location within the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可确定哪一项位于控件内的特定位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which item within the list is selected when a user right-clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法来确定哪些项列表中的选择了当用户右键单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The location of the cursor can be determined and passed to the `p` parameter of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A> method to determine which item the user right-clicked the mouse over.
trans-unit.target: 可以确定光标的位置，并将其传递给`p`参数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A>方法来确定用户的哪一项之前通过右键单击鼠标。

trans-unit.source: You can then display a shortcut menu to the user to provide tasks and features based on the specific item.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以为用户提供任务和基于特定项的功能来显示快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to perform drag-and-drop operations using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control that contains items to drop into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何执行拖放操作使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>包含用于放到项的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The constructor of the form sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AllowDrop%2A> property to `true` to enable drag-and-drop operations to occur in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 表单集的构造函数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AllowDrop%2A>属性`true`启用拖放操作中发生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to start the drag operation by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>启动拖动操作，通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> event to determine if an item being dragged into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> is a valid data type.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>事件来确定是否项拖放到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>是有效的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> event performs the actual dropping of a dragged item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control at the current cursor location within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>事件执行拖动的项到实际删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>内当前光标位置处的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> events have been connected to the event handlers defined in the example.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>事件已连接到示例中定义的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the location to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的位置的 x 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the location to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的位置的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the item at the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定坐标处的项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item found at the specified coordinates; returns <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" /> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 在指定坐标处找到的项的从零开始的索引；如果找不到匹配项，则返回 <see langword="ListBox.NoMatches" />。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to determine which item that is located at a specific location within the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可确定哪一项位于控件内的特定位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine which item within the list is selected when a user right-clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此方法来确定哪些项列表中的选择了当用户右键单击<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: The location of the cursor can be determined and passed to the `x` and `y` parameters of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A> method to determine which item the user right-clicked the mouse over.
trans-unit.target: 可以确定光标的位置，并将其传递给`x`和`y`参数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IndexFromPoint%2A>方法来确定用户的哪一项之前通过右键单击鼠标。

trans-unit.source: You can then display a shortcut menu to the user to provide tasks and features based on the specific item.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以为用户提供任务和基于特定项的功能来显示快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to perform drag-and-drop operations using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control that contains items to drop into a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何执行拖放操作使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>包含用于放到项的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The constructor of the form sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AllowDrop%2A> property to `true` to enable drag-and-drop operations to occur in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 表单集的构造函数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.AllowDrop%2A>属性`true`启用拖放操作中发生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> to start the drag operation by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>启动拖动操作，通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> event to determine if an item being dragged into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> is a valid data type.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>事件来确定是否项拖放到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>是有效的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> event performs the actual dropping of a dragged item into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> control at the current cursor location within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>事件执行拖动的项到实际删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>内当前光标位置处的控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter> events have been connected to the event handlers defined in the example.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter>事件已连接到示例中定义的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should resize to avoid showing partial items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件是否应调整大小以避免只显示项的局部。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control resizes so that it does not display partial items; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该控件调整大小以便不显示不完整的项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, the control automatically resizes to ensure that an item is not partially displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，该控件自动调整大小以确保不部分显示项。

trans-unit.source: If you want to maintain the original size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> based on the space requirements of your form, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要维护的原始大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>基于窗体的空间要求，将此属性设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> sizes are such that they show only whole items.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>大小是这样的： 它们仅显示整个项目。

trans-unit.source: If you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox> to completely fill a docked area, set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckedListBox>若要完全填充的停靠的区域，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A>到`false`。

trans-unit.source: This causes the control to completely fill the area, but the last item is not fully displayed.
trans-unit.target: 这将使控件以完全填充区域，但没有完全显示的最后一项。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> does not contain any items, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>不包含任何项，此属性不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The integral height is based on the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, rather than the client area height.
trans-unit.target: 整体高度基于高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，而不是工作区的高度。

trans-unit.source: As a result, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A> property is set `true`, items can still be partially shown if scroll bars are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A>属性设置`true`，项仍可部分显示是否显示滚动条。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性设置为`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`，此属性不起作用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A> properties to display a horizontal scroll bar that shows all item text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalScrollbar%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.HorizontalExtent%2A>属性，以显示水平滚动条的显示中的所有项文本<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A> property to ensure that items are not partially displayed due to the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.IntegralHeight%2A>属性以确保项未部分显示的大小由于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> control, named `listBox1`, has been added to a form.
trans-unit.target: 此示例需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>控件，名为`listBox1`，已添加到表单。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of an item in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 中项的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of an item in the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件中项的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed`, all items have the same height.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性设置为`DrawMode.OwnerDrawFixed`，所有项都具有高度相同。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A> property is set to `DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A> property specifies the height of each item added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.DrawMode%2A>属性设置为`DrawMode.OwnerDrawVariable`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>属性指定添加到每个项的高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: Because each item in an owner-drawn list can have a different height, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A> method to get the height of a specific item in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 由于为所有者描述的列表中每一项可以具有不同的高度，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.GetItemHeight%2A>方法以获取中特定项的高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> with items of variable height, this property returns the height of the first item in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>可变高度的项，此属性将返回第一项高度控件中。

trans-unit.source: The maximum height of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> item is 255 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 最大高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>项是 255 像素。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight" /> property was set to less than 0 or more than 255 pixels.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ItemHeight" /> 属性被设置为小于 0 或大于 255 像素。

trans-unit.source: Gets the items of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" /> 的项。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.ObjectCollection" /> representing the items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox" />.
